mapper.sql: satisfy_num, satisfy_name, satisfy_date, satisfy_status, satisfy_type_id, area_code, creater,share_status
lsi.satisfy_num, lsi.satisfy_name, lsi.satisfy_date, lsi.satisfy_status, lsi.satisfy_type_id, lsi.area_code, lsi.creater,lsi.satisfy_text,lsi.satisfy_title,lsi.satisfy_bottom,lsi.share_status
mapper.select:
select
from leanin_satisfy_info lsi,leanin_satisfy_patient lsp,leanin_patient_wx lpw where lsi.satisfy_status = 0 and lsp.patient_status = 0 and lsi.satisfy_num = lsp.form_id and lsp.patient_id = lpw.patient_id and lpw.open_id =#{openId} and lsp.finish_type =#{finishType}

select
from leanin_satisfy_info lsi,leanin_sty_info_record lsr,leanin_patient_wx lpw where lsi.satisfy_status = 0 and lsi.satisfy_num = lsr.satisfy_num and lsr.patient_id = lpw.patient_id and lpw.open_id =#{openId} and lsr.finish_status =#{finishType}

select lsi.* from leanin_satisfy_info lsi, leanin_satisfy_patient lsp,leanin_satisfy_plan lspl where lsi.satisfy_status = 0 and lsi.satisfy_num = lspl.satisfy_num and lspl.plan_satisfy_num = lsp.satisfy_plan_num and lsp.patient_satisfy_id = #{planPatientId}
mapper.update: update leanin_satisfy_info set satisfy_status=-1 where satisfy_num = #{satisfyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into leanin_satisfy_info
satisfy_num,
satisfy_name,
satisfy_status,
satisfy_type_id,
area_code,
creater,
satisfy_text,
satisfy_title,
satisfy_bottom,
share_status,
#{satisfyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{satisfyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{satisfyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{satisfyTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creater},
#{satisfyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{satisfyTitle},
#{satisfyBottom},
#{shareStatus},
mapper.update:
update leanin_satisfy_info
satisfy_name = #{satisfyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
satisfy_status = #{satisfyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
satisfy_type_id = #{satisfyTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater},
satisfy_text = #{satisfyText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
satisfy_title = #{satisfyTitle},
satisfy_bottom = #{satisfyBottom},
share_status = #{shareStatus},
where satisfy_num = #{satisfyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
